meta.title: GamerType — Discover Your Gaming Personality
meta.description: Discover your gaming personality type based on your Steam library. Fun AI-powered analysis.

landing.title: GamerType
landing.tagline: What kind of gamer are you, really?
landing.subtitle: AI will analyze your Steam library and create your collectible card
landing.inputPlaceholder: Steam ID, profile link, or vanity URL
landing.disclaimer: Entertainment content, not a real psychoanalysis

explain.dedication: Total playtime + % of games actually played
explain.mastery: Focus on top games + achievements + average hours per game
explain.exploration: Library size + genre diversity + spread across games
explain.veteran: Account age + Steam level + badge count

economics.title: Library Economics
economics.disclaimer: Prices are approximate, based on current Steam prices. This section is being improved.

invalidInput.title: Invalid format
invalidInput.description: Could not recognize the Steam profile. Please check your input.
steps: Copy the URL from the address bar

profileNotFound.title: Profile not found
profileNotFound.description: Could not find a Steam profile with this link.
steps: Check the URL or SteamID is correct

privateProfile.title: Private profile
privateProfile.description: This Steam profile is private. Game data needs to be public.
steps: Wait a couple minutes and try again

hiddenLibrary.title: Library hidden
hiddenLibrary.description: Profile is public but the game library is hidden in privacy settings.
steps: Wait a couple minutes and try again

fewGames.title: Too few games
fewGames.description: You need at least 5 games in your library for analysis. Not enough data yet.

emptyLibrary.title: Empty library
emptyLibrary.description: No games found in the library or data is unavailable. The library may be hidden in Steam privacy settings.
steps: Wait a couple minutes and try again

noPlaytime.title: Playtime data hidden
noPlaytime.description: Games are in the library, but playtime data is unavailable. Most likely, game stats are hidden in Steam privacy settings.
steps: Make sure 'Playtime' is also set to Public
Wait a couple minutes and try again

steamUnavailable.title: Steam unavailable
steamUnavailable.description: Steam servers are temporarily not responding. Usually resolves in a few minutes.

analysisError.title: Analysis error
analysisError.description: Something went wrong while creating your card. Please try again.

errors.expired: Analysis has expired. Click to re-analyze

rateLimited.title: Too many requests
rateLimited.description: Please wait a moment and try again.

gate.title: Unlock Your Full Card
gate.description: Subscribe to our Telegram channel to see your complete card
gate.hint: Tap the button, subscribe to the channel, then press Start in the bot

footer.disclaimer: Entertainment content. Not a medical or psychological assessment. Not affiliated with Valve Corporation.
